title: 11/04/20 HOUR 1-Mike Tirico
itunes:title: 11/04/20 HOUR 1-Mike Tirico
description:
Mike Tirico says that broadcasting with out fans is okay in the NFL stadium because of the piped in sound. Mike tells Dan that broadcasting a college football game feels more natural with a few fans and the school band in the stadium.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
